fields.name: _fields
fields.description: Comma separated list of fields to include in each response object

entityId.name: entity_id
entityId.description: The id of the required item or property

entityType.name: entity_type
entityType.description: The type of the required entity. Can only be one of `items` or `properties`.

offset.description: Results from offset index number and up
offset.name: offset

statementId.name: statement_id
statementId.description: The id of the required statement

wikiId.name: wiki_id
wikiId.description: The id of the wiki that the sitelink directs to

ifNoneMatch.name: If-None-Match
ifNoneMatch.description: Conditionally request a resource only if changed since specified entity revision number

ifModifiedSince.name: If-Modified-Since
ifModifiedSince.description: Conditionally request a resource only if it changed since specified date

NotModified.description: The specified resource has not modified since last provided revision number or date

NotFound.description: The specified resource was not found

UnauthenticatedError.description: An authentication error has occurred. This can happen due to missing authentication (i.e. no token presented) on resources which require it.

UnauthorizedError.description: An authorization error has occurred. This can happen if an authenticated user has insufficient privileges.

EntityAliases.description: A list of aliases for the requested language

EntityAliasesList.description: A list of aliases by language

SitelinkList.description: A list of sitelinks by site id

SnakList.description: A list of Snak (Property - Value pair) Objects

SnakMap.description: A map of propertyId to Snak Objects

DocumentPatchList.description: A list of JSONPatch objects as defined by RFC 6902

DocumentPatch.description: A JSONPatch object as defined by RFC 6902

path.description: A JSON-Pointer for the property to manipulate

value.description: The value to be used within the operation

get.summary: Retrieve a list of Wikibase Entities (Items or Properties)

requestBody.description: Edit payload containing a Wikibase entity object (Item / Property)

put.summary: Replace a Wikibase Entity by Id

patch.summary: Update a Wikibase Entity by Id

requestBody.description: Delete payload including a reason for deletion

get.summary: Retrieves an entity's alias list by language

put.summary: Add / Replace a whole alias list by language

requestBody.description: Edit payload containing list of Aliases

patch.summary: Updates an entity's alias list by language

delete.summary: Deletes an entity's alias list by language

get.summary: Retrieves an entity's description by language

put.summary: Add / Replace a description to an entity by language

delete.summary: Deletes an entity's description by language

get.summary: Retrieve an entity's label by language

put.summary: Add / Replace a label to an entity by language

requestBody.description: Edit payload containing an object with information about a value and the language it is in

delete.summary: Delete an entity's label by language

get.summary: Retrieve a list of entity Statements

post.summary: Add a new Statement to an entity (Item | Property)

get.summary: Retrieves an Item's sitelink by wiki-id

patch.summary: Updates an Item's sitelink by wiki-id

get.summary: Retrieves a single Statement from an entity (items | properties)
get.description: This endpoint is also accessible through `/entities/{entity_type}/{entity_id}/statements/{statement_id}`

patch.summary: Updates a Wikibase Statement by Id

requestBody.description: Edit payload containing a list of JSON-PATCH objects that describe changes to the resource

put.summary: Replaces a Wikibase Statement by Id

requestBody.description: Edit payload containing a Wikibase Statement object

delete.summary: Single statement from an entity (items | properties)
delete.description: This endpoint is also accessible through `/entities/{entity_type}/{entity_id}/statements/{statement_id}`

requestBody.description: Edit payload containing edit meta data

get.description: This endpoint is also accessible through `/entities/{entity_type}/{entity_id}/statements/{statement_id}/qualifiers`

post.summary: Add a new Qualifier to a Statement
post.description: This endpoint is also accessible through `/entities/{entity_type}/{entity_id}/statements/{statement_id}/qualifiers`

get.description: This endpoint is also accessible through `/entities/{entity_type}/{entity_id}/statements/{statement_id}/qualifiers/{qualifierHash}`

post.description: This endpoint is also accessible through `/entities/{entity_type}/{entity_id}/statements/{statement_id}/qualifiers/{qualifierHash}`

delete.description: This endpoint is also accessible through `/entities/{entity_type}/{entity_id}/statements/{statement_id}/qualifiers/{qualifier_hash}`

get.description: This endpoint is also accessible through `/entities/{entity_type}/{entity_id}/statements/{statement_id}/references`

post.summary: Add a new Reference to a Statement
post.description: This endpoint is also accessible through `/entities/{entity_type}/{entity_id}/statements/{statement_id}/references`

get.description: This endpoint is also accessible through `/entities/{entity_type}/{entity_id}/statements/{statement_id}/references/{reference_hash}`

post.description: This endpoint is also accessible through `/entities/{entity_type}/{entity_id}/statements/{statement_id}/references/{reference_hash}`

delete.description: This endpoint is also accessible through `/entities/{entity_type}/{entity_id}/statements/{statement_id}/references/{reference_hash}`
